div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Congratulations to Margaret Jarvis, who earned Mid America National Bank's Buzzy Best award for April. Way to go Margaret! This is the 24th year that the Mid America...

a.span: CHS April Senior of the Month

div.p: The Cuba High School staff has selected Bradley Mercer as the April Senior of the Month. For this honor, he will receive a fifty dollar gift card from program sponsor...
Congratulations to Kalyn Thum, who earned Mid America National Bank's Buzzy Best award for March. Way to go Kalyn! This is the 24th year that the Mid America National...

Good morning Cuba! Please check in today by going to https://www.cusd3.net/elearning and fill out the check in form for your building. Today is the last day of the week to check in. Friday’s are now make-up days. If your work is complete, then you get a day off tomorrow!

All IHSA spring sports have been canceled for the rest of the school year. Depending on stay at home order from state government, there is a slight possibility of spring sports playing in the month of June (exhibition type games/meets).

Dear CUSD#3 Students, Parents and Community Members: Please read the most recent letter regarding grading from Superintendent, Mrs. Angela Simmons-Kenser. Click the following link: https://5il.co/fg02

Here is this week's AMP Bingo card. Students can use this as part of their daily routines or as mental breaks between assignments. Please share pictures of your students participating in the activities. Email the pictures to: photos@cusd3.net. Gallery link: https://bit.ly/3dLSSCj view image
Good morning Cuba learners! Please check in today by going to https://www.cusd3.net/elearning and fill out the check in form for your building. Have a great day. It is going to be a beautiful one!
